entry.title: Friday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 27 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this morning then clearing. Local blowing snow this morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 27 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 40 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
